eu.amidst.core.datastream.filereaders

Interface DataRow

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataRowMissing

    public interface DataRow
    This interface represents a row of the data matrix containing the data. It can also be seen as a specific assignment to the attributes of a data set.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Attributes getAttributes()
      This method return the set of attributes which have an assigned value stored in this object.
      double getValue(Attribute att)
      This method return the value assigned to a given Attribute
      void setValue(Attribute att, double value)
      This method set the value assigned to an Attribute.

    • Method Detail

      • getAttributes

        Attributes getAttributes()
        This method return the set of attributes which have an assigned value stored in this object.
        Returns:
        A valid Attributes object

      • getValue

        double getValue(Attribute att)
        This method return the value assigned to a given Attribute
        Parameters:
        att, - the Attribute object we want to query
        Returns:
        The assigned value to the given Attribute. Returns a Double.NaN if the attribute is not observed in this assignment.

      • setValue

        void setValue(Attribute att,
              double value)
        This method set the value assigned to an Attribute. If the value is already include, then the value is updated accordingly.
        Parameters:
        att, - the Attribute object we want to assign
        value, - the assigned value
